raw_comment: We feel like, in order to draw a healthy conclusion on spring, at least 10 sightings of green vegetation would be necessary. Overall spring comes earlier to the south, however, in recent years spring has come later to the south, and early to the west coast and some eastern areas. Comparing the two graphs brings up the fact that spring comes earlier and later to the same regions in the U.S.
ace_sentences: We want to draw a healthy conclusion about spring.
At least 10 sightings of green vegetation are necessary to draw a healthy conclusion about spring.
In general, spring comes earlier in the south than in other regions.
In recent years, spring has come later in the south.
In recent years, spring has come earlier on the west coast.
In recent years, spring has come earlier in some eastern areas.
Comparing the two graphs shows a fact.
In the same regions in the U.S., spring comes earlier and spring comes later.
